description:
In this file, you'll find a few screens from the Stripe Webapp (Login, Dashboard and Payments section) entirely built with auto-layout.


I had a lot of fun re-building Stripe's beautiful UI from scratch, and I hope this will help other designers build interfaces faster and/or find some inspiration!
